item.description:
Whiskey Park has remained the areas most popular watering hole. At this upscale Boston/Manhattan bar, patrons can lounge on leather couches while sipping delicious libations in comfort and elegance.

I used to hangout at Whiskey Park and Whiskey Blue in Manhattan a lot. It's sort of like Disneyworld :] but in a good way!

This urban bar is located in the Boston Park Plaza was designed with indulgence in mind. It was designed as a comfortable yet sophisticated environment.

Hope to see you there!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Happy Hour at Whiskey Park - Boston
